Working alongside with the team and be able to get the information from the information stakeholders. Seeing through a feature from conception to finished feature. Designing and developing APIs. Tech / B.E) Excellent communication skills. Must be a highly motivated self-starter comfortable working in a fast paced environment andmust have good time-management skills. Team player meeting the tight deadlines and quality deliverables.
